message: Let's get this started! Accept my generous offer and we can split the money fairly.
You're starting strong, but I can do better!
You think you can do better? I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I think it's a fair deal this time!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not backing down!
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just getting strategic. This is a fair offer, Alice!
I'm not getting desperate, Bob! I'm just getting serious. This is my best offer so far, take it or leave it!
I'm not falling for your 'take it or leave it' tactic, Alice. I'll make you an offer you can't refuse... yet!
You think you're getting the upper hand, Bob? Think again! I'm making one last push for a fair deal.
It's getting late, Alice. I'm making one last serious offer. Take it or we both walk away with nothing!
